project.name: C-C805B-WIRE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C805B-WIRE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C805B-WIRE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF20-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="a" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
